page.title: 09CARMARTHEN SHOPPING 1985
page.content: Lisa,Lynne and Kathryn went outside Tesco one Thursday evening about 4pm.On Thursday there is late night shopping until 8pm.We asked these questions "Where do you live?" 52% lived more than 5 miles away and came by car,21% lived less than 5 miles away,26% lived less than 1 mile away. How did you come to town today?21% came by bus,69%came by car,8%walked. How long does your shopping usually take? 39% took 1-2 hours,4% took 2-3 hours,4% took 3-4 hours and 52% took less than 1 hour. How long have you known Carmarthen?91% had known Carmarthen for years and 8% had known Carmarthen for months. 1% had known Carmarthen for 1 day.Are you satisfied with Carmarthen as a shopping centre? 82% said yes and 18% said no.
